languages.text: Увы, наше оружие не могло пробить их проклятую броню. Узрев собственную беспомощность, солдаты обратились в бегство, сметая заградительные отряды и подставляя спины огню противника. Враг не смог удержаться от столь соблазнительного шанса и бросился в погоню. Они истребили тысячи моих товарищей прежде, чем подошедшие отряды бронетехники уничтожили проклятых еретиков одного за другим.

traits.locale_text: Увы, наше оружие не могло пробить их проклятую броню. Узрев собственную беспомощность, солдаты обратились в бегство, сметая заградительные отряды и подставляя спины врагу. Враг не смог удержаться от столь соблазнительного шанса и бросился в погоню. Они истребили тысячи моих товарищей прежде, чем подошедшие отряды бронетехники не уничтожили проклятых еретиков одного за другим.

languages.text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.
languages.original_text: Увы, наше оружие не могло пробить их проклятую броню. Узрев собственную беспомощность, солдаты обратились в бегство, сметая заградительные отряды и подставляя спины огню противника. Враг не смог удержаться от столь соблазнительного шанса и бросился в погоню. Они истребили тысячи моих товарищей прежде, чем подошедшие отряды бронетехники уничтожили проклятых еретиков одного за другим.

traits.locale_text: Our weapons could not even dent their blasted armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to the enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the accursed heretics one by one.

Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the accursed heretics one by one.

Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the accursed heretics one by one.

Our weapons could not even dent their blasted armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to the enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the accursed heretics one by one.

Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

languages.text: 我们的武器甚至根本无法在他们邪恶的装甲上打出一点点凹痕。身边的士兵看到进攻徒劳无功，便纷纷逃跑，穿过了位于后方的部队，直接将后背暴露在敌人的火力之下。在这样的诱惑之下，敌人紧追不舍。到最后，装甲部队终于赶到，将这些该死的异端分子逐一消灭。可那个时候，我成千上万的战友已经惨遭屠杀。
languages.original_text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

traits.locale_text: 我们的武器甚至根本无法在他们的防爆装甲上打出一点点凹痕。身边的士兵看到进攻徒劳无功，便纷纷逃跑，穿过了位于后方的部队，直接将后背暴露在敌人的火力之下。在这样的诱惑之下，敌人紧追不舍。到最后，装甲部队终于赶到，将这些该死的异端分子逐一消灭。可那个时候，我成千上万的战友已经惨遭屠杀。

languages.text: Nos balles ne parvenaient même pas à érafler leurs maudites armures. Comprenant que leurs efforts étaient vains, nos soldats ont tourné les talons et pris la fuite en fonçant à travers les unités de barrage, exposant leur dos aux tirs ennemis. Pour nos adversaires, la tentation de les poursuivre était trop grande, et des milliers de mes compagnons d'armes ont eu le temps d'être massacrés avant que les blindés n'arrivent pour éliminer un par un ces maudits hérétiques.
languages.original_text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

traits.locale_text: Nos balles ne parvenaient même pas à érafler leurs maudites armures. Comprenant que leurs efforts étaient vains, nos soldats ont tourné les talons et pris la fuite en fonçant à travers les unités de barrage, exposant leur dos aux tirs ennemis. Pour nos adversaires, la tentation de les poursuivre était trop grande, et des milliers de mes compagnons d'armes ont eu le temps d'être massacrés avant que les blindés n'arrivent pour éliminer un par un ces maudits hérétiques.

languages.text: 我々の武器は、奴らの忌まわしき装甲に傷ひとつつけることすらできなかった。攻撃をしても無駄と判断した兵士たちはバリアユニットを切り裂いて逃げ出し、背中を敵の砲火にさらした。誘惑に勝てず、敵は追いかけてきた。忌まわしい異端者たちをひとりずつ殲滅する装甲車が到着する前に、何千人もの戦友が虐殺された。
languages.original_text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

traits.locale_text: 我々の武器は、奴らの吹き飛ばされた装甲に傷ひとつつけることすらできなかった。攻撃をしても無駄と判断した兵士たちはバリアユニットを切り裂いて逃げ出し、背中を敵の砲火にさらした。誘惑に勝てず、敵は追いかけてきた。呪われた異端者たちをひとりずつ殲滅する装甲車が到着する前に、何千人もの戦友が虐殺された。

languages.text: Nuestras armas ni siquiera abollaban sus armaduras malditas. Al ver la futilidad de sus esfuerzos, nuestros soldados huyeron, atravesando las barreras y exponiendo sus espaldas al fuego enemigo. Nuestros adversarios no pudieron resistir la tentación y les dieron caza. Miles de mis camaradas perecieron en la carnicería antes de que llegaran los vehículos blindados a destruir a los abominables herejes de uno en uno.
languages.original_text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

traits.locale_text: Nuestras armas ni siquiera abollaban sus armaduras malditas. Al ver la futilidad de sus esfuerzos, nuestros soldados huyeron, atravesando las barreras y exponiendo sus espaldas al fuego enemigo. Nuestros adversarios no pudieron resistir la tentación y les dieron caza. Miles de mis camaradas perecieron en la carnicería antes de que llegaran los vehículos blindados a destruir a los herejes de uno en uno.

languages.text: Unsere Waffen konnten ihrer verfluchten Rüstung nicht die kleinste Delle verpassen. Als unsere Soldaten erkannten, wie aussichtslos ihre Bemühungen waren, flohen sie, rannten durch die Barriereeinheiten und ließen ihren Rücken ungeschützt gegen das feindliche Feuer. Unser Feind konnte der Versuchung nicht widerstehen und nahm die Verfolgung auf. Tausende meiner Waffenkameraden wurden abgeschlachtet, bevor die Panzerfahrzeuge eintrafen, um die verdammten Ketzer einen nach dem anderen auszulöschen.
languages.original_text: Our weapons could not even dent their accursed armour. Upon seeing the futility of their struggles, our soldiers fled, tearing through the barrier units and leaving their backs open to enemy fire. Unable to resist the temptation, our adversary gave chase. Thousands of my comrades-in-arms were butchered before the armoured vehicles arrived to destroy the damnable heretics one by one.

traits.locale_text: Unsere Waffen konnten ihrer verfluchten Rüstung nicht die kleinste Delle verpassen. Als unsere Soldaten erkannten, wie aussichtslos ihre Bemühungen waren, flohen sie, rannten durch die Barriereeinheiten und ließen ihren Rücken ungeschützt gegen das feindliche Feuer. Unser Feind konnte der Versuchung nicht widerstehen und nahm die Verfolgung auf. Tausende meiner Waffenkameraden wurden abgeschlachtet, bevor die Panzerfahrzeuge eintrafen, um die verfluchten Ketzer einen nach dem anderen auszulöschen.
